review: While I find the stick to be a lifesaver after the sad death of my Wii, I think that it has its faults. I love the apps and games that come with it and it makes having friends over even more entertaining but when it comes to internet connection, it lacks the range. Videos generally work but there are many times in which the internet is not connecting and it buffers for so long that I give up.

review: Decent product for a decent price. We are in the process of getting rid of cable and wanted to test out this product prior to doing so. It was very easy to hookup and setup. The Fire stick is lacking in some areas... you can't access HBO-Go from it yet, I wasn't able to set up shortcuts for local stations that are options on other devices. Overall, I think it's a good device to have being an Amazon Prime member but I don't think this device alone will allow us to still have access to the shows we watch.
